mapper.insert: insert into member(memberId, memberPwd, memberName, memberNickname, memberPhoto, memberBirth,memberGender, memberPhone) values(#{memberId},#{memberPwd},#{memberName},#{memberNickname},#{memberPhoto},#{memberBirth},#{memberGender},#{memberPhone})
mapper.select: select memberId, memberPwd, memberName, memberNickname, memberPhoto, memberBirth,memberGender, memberPhone, memberIntro from member where memberId = #{id}

select b.memberId, count(*) as count, b.memberNickname, b.memberPhoto, DATE_FORMAT(b.memberBirth, '%Y-%m-%d') as memberBirth, DATE_FORMAT(b.memberRegisterDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as memberRegisterDate from questionboard a, member b where a.memId = b.memberId group by a.memId order by count(*) desc;
